---
title: "feature-request.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines a GitHub issue template for feature requests. It provides a structured format for users to suggest new ideas, features, or improvements for the Metriport project, ensuring that all necessary information is collected consistently.

## Symbols

### Feature Request
#### Description
This is the main structure of the issue template, defining the name, description, labels, and body of the feature request form.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| name | string | The name of the issue template |
| description | string | A brief description of the template's purpose |
| labels | array of strings | Labels to be automatically applied to the issue |
| body | array of objects | The form fields that make up the feature request template |

#### Internal Logic
The template is structured to guide users through providing essential information about their feature request, including the problem they're facing, their suggested solution, alternatives they've considered, and any additional context.

### Markdown Introduction
#### Description
This is an introductory section using markdown to provide important information and guidelines to users before they start filling out the feature request.

#### Internal Logic
It includes:
1. A warning about reporting security vulnerabilities separately
2. A recommendation to search for existing issues
3. Information about using Markdown in the form
4. A note of appreciation for filling out the form

### Problem Description
#### Description
A required textarea field for users to describe the problem they're experiencing or the need for the feature.

### Suggested Solution
#### Description
A required textarea field for users to propose their solution or describe the feature they'd like to see implemented.

### Alternatives
#### Description
An optional textarea field for users to describe any alternative solutions or features they've considered.

### Additional Context
#### Description
An optional textarea field for users to provide any additional information that might be relevant to understanding their feature request.

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| GitHub Actions | This template relies on GitHub's issue template system and Actions for processing |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| labels | array | ["feature", "triage"] | Default labels applied to issues created with this template |

## API/Interface Reference
| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|:------|:-----|:---------|:------------|
| Problem | textarea | Yes | Description of the problem or need |
| Suggested solution | textarea | Yes | Proposed solution or feature |
| Alternatives | textarea | No | Alternative solutions considered |
| Additional context | textarea | No | Any other relevant information |

This template provides a structured way for users to submit feature requests, ensuring that maintainers receive all necessary information to evaluate and potentially implement new features or improvements.
